title: "Great Tristana buffer on the W!" - LCS caster
body: No it wasn't great we all know it's bullshit and hilariously easy to pull off against every telegraphed hard CC in the game.

replies.body: This thread isn't going to generate anything but an echo chamber or circle jerk. No potential discussion and to be honest it's keeping more well thought out threads from being seen.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-18T22:26:17.487+0000)
>
> This thread isn't going to generate anything but an echo chamber or circle jerk. No potential discussion and to be honest it's keeping more well thought out threads from being seen.

Oh but its OK for there to be a Anti Zoe echo chamber hate train that ignores facts for subjective biased views am I right?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/detailed/
Sort by ban rate and then proceed to explain that, please. Tell us more about the facts and our echo chamber and whatnot.

Or don't, since it's off-topic.

So half of high elo is an echo chamber where they ignore facts, don't build right, don't play right and they all need to git gud.
http://mymemes.biz/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/this-is-bait-meme-59d4834d10f61.png

Most of league is a circle jerk echo chamber. Zoe has clear and defined weaknesses that no one wants to exploit.

She plays like an assassin, and is terrible at teamfights as a result, enforced by sleep breaking on any champion damage (meaning her team can screw her CC and damage)

She has no mobility like a long range mage (her R gives her temporary mobility so she can play her assassin role, but brings her back to her original cast point)

Most of her damage is frontloaded into Q via her passive, E and R. If she fails to kill someone in 1 combo, she becomes useless, like an assassin. 

She lacks waveclear, and general AoE

Her main form of combo requires a 2.3 second delay before she can kill someone, making teamfighting, again, difficult.


People just like to cry foul all day and ban instead of learning how to play against the champion and her numerous weaknesses.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-19T01:43:31.109+0000)

> She lacks waveclear, and general AoE


lol what the fuck

are you bronze?

>People just like to cry foul all day and ban instead of learning how to play against the champion and her numerous weaknesses.


So by your logic, the pros and everyone that's plat+ doesn't want to learn how to play against her, so they miraculously made her the most banned champion in both casual and pro play, in all regions?

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010001,timestamp=2018-02-19T06:11:50.713+0000)
>
> So by your logic, the pros and everyone that's plat+ doesn't want to learn how to play against her, so they miraculously made her the most banned champion in both casual and pro play, in all regions?

this is exatctly what got cammile hot fix nerfed not 1 week after reaching live servers and 7 times in a row afterward because no one wanted to learn how to face the new ult when her Q W and E was weak due to the strength of her ult. While zoe can have her w and not have her q e and ult gimped because of it. camille then got nerfs on W E Passive Ult  and only buffs to q but the most toxic part of her kit in the true damage rather than the physical damage part.
That is the greatest bait imagine I've ever seen. It has now topped my Guts bait image.
He says, while being too much of a coward to post on his non-smurph account.

> [{quoted}](name=Jinx Hunter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:54:37.210+0000)
>
> You are still not out arguing my points.

That which is asserted without evidence is dismissed without evidence. There are a dozen statistics that contradict your ""''point"""; meanwhile you've presented only your feelings as an argument and are hiding behind an unranked smurph. Presumably because you know exactly what would happen if you didn't.

I just fail to see it.

Kassawin had a 98% ban rate and still had a 58% winrate because he was actually broke.

I dont care if zoe has a 99% ban rate if she cant even maintain a 50% WR shes not as broken as the circle jerks want people to believe.

Does she need tuning yes. Is she the worst thing ever to happen to leauge like the circle jerks say... fuck no.

> [{quoted}](name=NocturnalSheild,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-19T00:59:48.728+0000)
>
> I just fail to see it.
> 
> Kassawin had a 98% ban rate and still had a 58% winrate because he was actually broke.
> 
> I dont care if zoe has a 99% ban rate if she cant even maintain a 50% WR shes not as broken as the circle jerks want people to believe.
> 
> Does she need tuning yes. Is she the worst thing ever to happen to leauge like the circle jerks say... fuck no.

kassadin never claimed to be a hard mechanically intensive champion. those champions should naturally not be balanced at the same winrate as a champion that is supposedly braindead unless they are infact brain dead themselves and thus you cant justify their damage output.
 Balanceing brain dead champions at a 50% winrate is stupid too.

Kassadin actually had a 10 on the difficulty meter when he was broken.

And Zoe isnâ€™t mechanically hard. You just have to land skill shots.
Still, the Zoe "discussions" are generally just echo chambers without discussion.  Regardless of her true balance, there isn't any real discussion going on about her.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-18T22:26:17.487+0000)
>
> This thread isn't going to generate anything but an echo chamber or circle jerk. No potential discussion and to be honest it's keeping more well thought out threads from being seen.

There is potential discussion. Are you willing to defend tristana's ability to ignore getting caught by hard CC just because she pressed W?

No because it would lead to the echo chamber participants mass downvoting me regardless and I don't really care about the topic as its not as big of an issue and I don't have enough knowledge about it. 

There is no discussion here. The post is greatly geared to only agreeing with one side.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2018-02-19T03:09:58.118+0000)
>
> No because it would lead to the echo chamber participants mass downvoting me regardless and I don't really care about the topic as its not as big of an issue and I don't have enough knowledge about it. 
> 
> There is no discussion here. The post is greatly geared to only agreeing with one side.

Sounds like a case of "I hate that there's an implicit thesis that takes a stance on only one side"
Whats the point in arguing against it in an echo chamber is my point.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=00010001000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-19T05:20:56.213+0000)
>
> Whats the point in arguing against it in an echo chamber is my point.

"Why argue against this guy he believes in one side."
No this is a circle jerk post. And it encourages the echo chamber behavior that is common on the gameplay board.
Why care if you get downvotes?

Because it reduces my comment's visibility and my inbox will be full of the same circle jerk arguments. 

Again, this post is bad because it encourages the echo chamber.
Then why have you posted so many times saying that it's an echo chamber? Aren't you receiving what you're afraid of in the first place?

No because the entire gameplay front page isn't covered with posts about it. 

You seem to be ignoring the issue that is this post and what it represents.
downvoted for low effort content
What discussion are you looking for? Maybe OP thinks it wasn't a great play, maybe someone else thinks it was?
I'm not looking for positive discussion here because there wont be any.

So you're upset because a discussion you're not looking for isn't here?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} you ok bro?

I'm not upset. Are you assuming or just claiming it to make me appear irrational? It seems like the latter but if not please correct me. 

It's not that the discussion I'm looking for isn't here.

Its that there isn't going to be any good discussion. In an echo chamber, alternate ideas are not encouraged, and thus real discussions are much less likely to actually occur.

You're clearly not in a happy situation and feel strongly enough to comment, so you're upset. 

If you think this is an echo chamber just because you say it is, you're sorely mistaken. This is far from an echo chamber. An actual echo chamber would forbid you from even posting something opposite to what is thought of.

I mean, sure, but.

Then why are you posting?

I'm posting here because there is a purpose to it. 

I'm trying to point out how pointless this thread is. _My single comment made more discussion than anything else the thread made_.

The original post is definitely not geared towards discussion, but it at least starts off with frustration which we can use as grounds for proper discussion. He sees Tristana's buffer as a given power to be taken for granted because of its simplicity, whereas the casters announce it as a significant skillful play. We can proceed from here, either criticizing the casters for being misleading or by criticizing the design of the ability.
Braindead overtuned champ

It's like casters are paid to exaggerate adc plays

"Wow nice right click there sick outplay!"

Meanwhile they have a whole frontline in front of them making sure they can right click.
Nothing in this entire game is hard to do, you just press a fucking button lol
I'll have you know, turning off your heat and sitting in 2 degrees Celsius really fucks your fingers.
jokes on you, I play with a complicated system of pulleys and levers
[data](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/YxYzikyg-tristana-rocket-jump?comment=0017)

Her dash is the longest in the game. She is too safe. She needs to have this nerfed. If she had her jump on half the range fine. But one jump and she is out of reach. There is no reason to keep her safe like this. She already has ultimate and high auto attack range.

Her jump was **the exact same** when she was one of the worst and most trash ADC in the game.
So I have to totally disagree with you. This jump is hardly a problem, but I've spent so much time the last couple weeks trying to explain it, and I don't think I'll convince you sir/madam.

So... can we maybe please let us just be civil and agree to disagree? :)

She was never trash ADC. I played her at that time when she was considered trash few months before she "came back" to meta. The reason she started being popular weren't some massive buffs or something. It was other ADCs either being much stronger or meta having better reliability with other ADCs than her. Unfortunately now with new runes range, poke, safe gameplay is all that matters because one kill leads to snowball that guarantees win and riot doesn't seem to want to change it so Tristana will never be bad.
Well, I tried...

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pook3IwA,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2018-02-19T23:15:41.535+0000)
>
> Her jump was **the exact same** when she was one of the worst and most trash ADC in the game.
> So I have to totally disagree with you. This jump is hardly a problem, but I've spent so much time the last couple weeks trying to explain it, and I don't think I'll convince you sir/madam.
> 
> So... can we maybe please let us just be civil and agree to disagree? :)

IOW, her jump has been bullshit since inception.

Her balance state at any given time is meaningless.
But conversely you can also cancel her jump if you time it correctly
generally she isn't hopping away unless you pose a huge threat though. she's strong enough to kite most stuff away, not to mention her ult
